messages.title: More gloom with Labour and the Conservatives
messages.content: Already hiked taxes for lowest paid workers and pensioners. Tax cuts just for millionaires with the Conservatives. The Conservatives and Labour are both planning to raise VAT as high as 20 per cent.

messages.title: IT'S A TWO HORSE RACE!
messages.content: The Conservatives can't win in many parts of Britain. Only the Liberal Democrats is between a Lib Dem and a Labour MP. Only the Liberal Democrats will deliver real change and fairness.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Conservatives can't win in many parts of Britain. Only the Liberal Democrats is between a Lib Dem and Labour MP.

issues.economy: Already hiked taxes for lowest paid workers and pensioners. Tax cuts just for millionaires with the Conservatives. The Conservatives and Labour are both planning to raise VAT as high as 20 per cent.

images.caption: More gloom with Labour and the Conservatives
Who will deliver the change we need on tax?
